revised_title: Quaternary History and Morphology of the Lower Greensand Escarpment and Weald Clay Vale near Sevenoaks, Kent
tldr: This article discusses the Quaternary history, morphology, and geological features of the Lower Greensand Escarpment and Weald Clay Vale near Sevenoaks, Kent. The authors examine periglacial solifluction deposits, structural disturbances, landslides, and river terraces in the area, providing insights into the region's geological past and landscape evolution.
